SEARCH
Package gw.api.rest.validation

Class ValidatorFactoryValidationResult

java.lang.Object
gw.api.rest.validation.ValidatorFactoryValidationResult
public class ValidatorFactoryValidationResult extends Object
This is a wrapper object around a JsonValidationResult that can be used to report configuration validation errors from the IRestValidatorFactory class. The wrapper class takes care of the details of mapping a given object (definition, property, property items, parameter, or parameter items) back to the configuration file(s) and line number(s) that defined that object.

    • addError

      public void addError(@NotNull @NotNull Object context, @NotNull @PropertyKey(resourceBundle="locale.display") @NotNull @PropertyKey(resourceBundle="locale.display") String messageKey, @NotNull @NotNull Object... messageArgs)
      Reports a validation error associated with the given configuration object.
      Parameters:
      context - the configuration object that has an invalid configuration; this should be a JsonSchemaProperty, JsonSchemaDefinition, JsonSchemaItems, SwaggerParameter, SwaggerItems, or SwaggerOperation
      messageKey - the display key to use for the error message
      messageArgs - the arguments to that display key, if any
